CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Need Info From Client"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/sunflower.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Renewal - Need Info"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/pumpkin.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Qualification Needed"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/avocado.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Need to Submit"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/grass.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Application Submitted"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/pool.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Received"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/lavender.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Presented"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/royal.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Approved/Closed Won"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/emerald.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Closed Lost"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/hibiscus.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"On Hold"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/sunflower.png',"",14,50), IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Referred"), IMAGE('resource/OppColors/colors/cyan.png',"",14,50), "")))))))))))
CustomField.label: Stage Color
